headline: 73 Ameriprise Financial Advisors Named to the Barron’s "Top 1,200 Financial Advisors" List
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, March 20, 2025--Ameriprise Financial, Inc. (NYSE: AMP) announced that 73 of its financial advisors were named to the 2025 Barron’s "Top 1,200 Financial Advisors" list. Barron’s recognizes the industry’s top advisors according to several factors including professionalism, community impact and success in the business. The rankings are based on data provided by more than 7,000 of the nation’s most productive advisors.
